attributes.additional_details:
Sadly, this hasn’t happened for Non-League Football. We are yet to see the return of NLF despite most clubs being able to provide social distancing measures and guidelines which would keep us all safe. 
At the time of starting this petition, Steps 1-7 are NOT allowed any fans inside the ground and all matches should be played behind closed doors. How can this be fair?
Our Non-League clubs will not survive without gate/match-day income. We are yet to receive a firm start date. #LetFansIn
attributes.background: Since we have passed the peak of the Coronavirus pandemic in the UK back around April/May time we have seen various places open that can hold a decent sized social gathering. These include; pubs, cinemas, beaches and shopping centre’s etc where at any one time could see 1000’s attend.
